name: Bach Ma National Park Full Day
description: Located midway between Hue and Danang, Bach Ma National Park covers an area of 22,000 hectares. Home to a wide variety of animals and plants, the park is well-known for its biodiversity. The weather here is like the weather in Dalat or Sapa due to its high level compared with the sea. Coming to visit the park, you will have chance to discover the beautiful landscape and natural wonder, while you enjoy an adventure of the spirit.
